Class Promotion Controller¶

class src.controllers.PromotionController.PromotionController[source]¶

Class PromotionController This class is responsible of all operation related to promotions: Listing, creating and deleting of promotions are the common options

Returns:PromotionController object

static add_article(org)[source]¶

Add article Given an article and a promotion objects, this function can add the article to the promotion.

Parameters:org – Organization
static create_promotion(org)[source]¶

Create promotion method This function aims to create a new promotion and add it to the organization’s promotions list

Parameters:org – Organization
static list_promotions(org)[source]¶

List promotion method Responsible of displaying a list of promotions that belong to the organization

Parameters:org – Organization
static prom_controller(org)[source]¶

Promotion controller method This method is responsible of all operation related to promotions

Remove article method Removes an article from the promotion

Parameters:org – Organization
static remove_promotion(org)[source]¶

Remove promotion method Removes an promotion from the organization’s promotion list
